name: verify_the_captcha
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool captcha.
Tool description: Feeling nostalgic? Generate the same old alphanumeric captchas.
API description: Verifies the given CAPTCHA using the provided uuid and Toolbench RapidAPI key.

captcha.description: The value of the CAPTCHA to be verified.

uuid.description: The unique identifier for the CAPTCHA session.
